data.card_title: Smoked salmon, quinoa & dill lunch pot
data.card_desc: This easy packed lunch is as delicious as it is nutritious, with crunchy cucumber and radishes and a herby, creamy dressing
This quick, spicy brunch dish is packed with healthy courgettes, chickpeas, tomatos and spinach. Flavour your sauce with rose harissa

data.card_title: Parsnip latkes with smoked haddock & poached egg
data.card_desc: Looking to use up a glut of parsnips? We’ve swapped classic potato for root veg in these golden brown brunch latkes, with a poached egg and smoked fish
This healthy supper is super speedy - top lettuce leaves with cooked chicken, colourful vegetables and a peanut and sweet chilli sauce
This creamy one-pot chicken dish is a great-value way of feeding the whole family
These gluten-free buckwheat pancakes are high in protein, folate and tasty too, with buttermilk, spinach and a pinch of paprika for added punch
This fresh, flavoursome breakfast from Joe Wicks is low in carbohydrates, high in protein and easy to make. It's quick and will keep you full 'til lunch
This superhealthy pork one-pot is a midweek miracle. Serve with rice or noodles for an everyday favourite
A quick roast with an Italian flavour, and low in fat - sounds too good to be true?

data.card_title: Split pea & green pea smoked ham soup
data.card_desc: John Torode shares the recipe for one of his all-time favourite soups
Put a new spin on mince with this spicy Indian dish. Serve with poppadums, chutney and cooling yogurt
Tick off all 5 of your 5 a day with this super-healthy Sunday roast. To make it vegetarian, omit the lamb and add chickpeas to the caponata.
Filling and fast, and just as good the next day in your lunchbox
Shopping for dinner doesn't have to be a chore, this five ingredient dish will have you in and out in no time, so there's more time to relax at home
Braise butter beans or 'gigantes' with tomatoes, onion and garlic and serve with tender lamb fillet and crumbled feta cheese

data.card_title: Lamb with buckwheat noodles & tomato dressing
data.card_desc: This stir-fry is low in fat and calories. Use a lean cut of meat and combine with plenty of vegetables to get four of your recommended 5-a-day
Slow cook beef with cinnamon, saffron, coriander and harissa for a deeply fragrant rustic casserole
Don't reach for the takeaway menu, try this beef stir-fry recipe instead. It's just as tasty as your favourite Chinese and healthier too.
Quick, cheap and tasty, this chilli-spiked omelette can be made from storecupboard and everyday ingredients
Try our easy, healthy beef stew recipe that's packed full of vitamin C. This warming dinner is perfect for chilly nights
Prepare these plaice parcels ahead for easy entertaining - great for making the most of those summer herbs
Ready-to-eat pouches of grain mean you can have a healthy lunch in minutes. Mix with veg and sustainable tuna
Serve this tasty white fish with a chunky Mediterranean salad

data.card_title: Red spiced fish with green salad
data.card_desc: Spice up plain white fish fillets with Thai flavours in this healthy recipe
